page.title: 14Organisations in Hungerford.
page.content: The Round Table is one of the most important organisation in Hungerford are about 25 members who meet regularly at the Three Swans Hotel. They raise funds for good causes in the town and run the Carnival which is an annual event. Members must be over the age of 18 and leave the Round Table at 40 years of age.The first Round Table(No.1)was formed in Norwich 50 years ago and the Hungerford Table(No.1109) has been going for ten years. The Young Wives has been running for 26 years and has 40 members . Meetings are held in the Youth Community Centre. The main purpose is to provide an opportunity for young married women to meet without their children. There is a varied programme of visits and speakers to interest everyone.
